description:
Lacospo is a prince from the planet Gaama as well as one of Lala`s fianc√© candidates and one of the few antagonists in the first series. He is by far the most persistent of Lala`s suitors and most recurring to try to win her love. Appearing multiple times in the manga to steal Lala, and even hired Konjiki no Yami and Ranjula to assassinate Yuuki Rito.
Source: To Love-ru Wikia
name: Lacospo
